## Capstone Milestones

The table below outlines the major milestones you will complete to satisfy capstone components of the MUP program requirements. UP 591 is designed to help you successfully navigate preparing these deliverables:

+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| **Deliverable**                                                   | **Due Date**                                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| [Workshop and Capstone Pathway Adoption](01_capstoneadoption.qmd) | Capstone Adoption Web Form (all pathways): 5/2/2025 |
|                                                                   |                                                     |
|                                                                   | Project / Thesis Capstone Adoption Form: 9/8/2025   |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| [Plan of Study Update](02_planofstudy.qmd)                        | 9/2025                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| [Professional Development Plan](03_developmentplan.qmd)           | 10/2025                                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| [MUP Portfolio](04_portfolio.qmd)                                 | 5/2026                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| [MUP Poster](05_poster.qmd)                                       | 5/2026                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| [Capstone Exit Submission](06_capstoneexit.qmd)                   | 5/2026                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+

It is important to review the details of each of these milestones, particularly since some have both draft and final components with separate deliverable dates. You will also find submission details and requirements for each milestone included with its description.
